title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Inside the Attack on Hezbollah’s Weapon Depot in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a weapons depot of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory.

IDF forces attacked a short while ago a weapons depot of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory in the Arab al-Aramsha area, in response to the rocket fire carried out from the area towards an IDF post.

In addition, a number of launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards the Tel Hai area and Kiryat Shmona, and towards an IDF post in the Shetula area, the IDF attacked the sources of fire.

Also, the IDF performed artillery fire towards several areas in Lebanese territory.

A documentation of the depot attack is attached: https://bit.ly/417il2k
